      • NavigatorComponent

        public NavigatorComponent(BBjWindow wnd!, BBjInt id!, BBjInt x!, BBjInt y!, BBjInt w!, BBjInt h!)

        The constructor that creates the widget on wnd!

        Parameters:
        BBjWindow wnd!: parent window
        BBjInt id: the control ID
        BBjInt x: x-location
        BBjInt y: y-location
        BBjInt w: width
        BBjInt h: height

        public void redraw(Boolean f_init!)

        @Override This method is called whenever the widget needs to be rendered

        Parameters:
        Boolean f_init!: if TRUE the control is rendered for the first time so this method has to perform initial rendering
